remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來將資料轉換的和字串類型。The class is used to convert data to and from and string types. > [!CAUTION] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷是否執行個體從呼叫這個方法的類別支援的標準值集合，可以從使用指定的格式內容的清單中選取。Use the method to determine whether the instance of the class that this method is called from supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified format context. 永遠傳回覆寫這個方法`true`來指示此類別支援的標準值集合，可以從清單中挑選。This method is overridden to always return `true` to indicate that this class supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
